title: Bachelor of Science in Secondary Education
description: The Kennesaw State University Secondary Education degree will prepare you to become a secondary grade (grades 6 – 12) teacher. Once you have completed the degree requirements and state exams for Secondary Education, you’ll receive a Georgia teaching license and be certified to teach grades 6 -12. You’ll have the opportunity to choose from the following concentration areas:
careers: Adult Literacy or High School Equivalency Diploma Teacher, High School Teacher, Instructional Coordinator, Middle School Teacher, Special Education Teacher.
school: Department of Secondary & Middle Grades Education
